post: Thank you, Master Printing + Mailing, for donating 250,000 Pocket Constitutions to classrooms nationwide via Power of the Printed Word. Your generous gift is much appreciated by Americas students! Tag a print-industry peer who should join next! 🔗  https://bit.ly/4aqFf9S Also grateful for partners supporting distribution: Case Paper, Konica Minolta Business Solutions U. S. A., Inc., History By Mail, TECNAU, Canon USA, and Heidelberger Druckmaschinen AG If your company prints, mails, or supplies paper/equipment, and wants to put primary sources in students hands, lets talk.  #PowerOfThePrintedWord  #CivicEducation  #America250  #Civics

We are proud to support the Bill of Rights Institute's Power of the Printed Word Initiative by donating the printing and distribution of "250 for 250." That's 250,000 pocket constitutions supporting 2,500 government, history and civics classrooms across the country! The Constitution and Bill of Rights remain the framework and firm foundation of the American experiment. If you are interested in learning more, please visit the Bill of Rights Institute at www.mybri.org  #constitution  #billofrights  #civics  #history  #government  #poweroftheprintedword  #printing  #marketing  #digitalmarketing  #printwithmaster

Midyear reset: pick one lesson youre already teaching and add a quick connection to the Declaration, then log it. The Civic Star Challenge is built for busy classrooms (fast entry, real recognition).
